diff:
diff --git a/libfreerdp/core/gcc.c b/libfreerdp/core/gcc.c
index d135d8353..b05a141b7 100644
--- a/libfreerdp/core/gcc.c
+++ b/libfreerdp/core/gcc.c
@@ -1856,7 +1856,10 @@ BOOL gcc_read_client_network_data(wStream* s, rdpMcs* mcs)
 
 	Stream_Read_UINT8(s, mcs->channelCount); /* channelCount */
 
-	if (blockLength < 4 + (UINT8)mcs->channelCount * 12)
+	/* Check if we have enough data for channelCount + padding (3 bytes) +
+	 * all channel definitions (12 bytes each: 8 for name + 4 for options) */
+	const size_t requiredLength = 4 + (size_t)mcs->channelCount * 12;
+	if (blockLength < requiredLength)
 		return FALSE;
 
 	if (mcs->channelCount > CHANNEL_MAX_COUNT)
